title: Members of Dandy Duffers Golf club holding trophies and gathered in Loendi Club, including from left: Louise Hinton, Aurelia Johnson, Georgianna Miles, Kathleen Holloway; second row: Tournament Chairman Charles Hinton, Jack Hopkins, Jack Kelley, Wesley Carr, Henry Lee, Harry Irvin, Champion Dave Doggins and Vice-President Sterling Perkins; back row: Clarence Bruce, Joe Preston, John White, Luther Thomas, John Henderson, Charles Berry, Garland Morton
